trans-unit.source: Represents an item (row) in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
A DataGridItem object represents an item (row) in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row.
trans-unit.target: DataGridItem 개체가 나타냅니다 항목 (행)는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤에 머리글 구역이, 바닥글 섹션 데이터 행과 같은.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The data items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 항목은는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>제어에 저장 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>를 사용 하 여 액세스할 수 있는 컬렉션에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A>속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can use a DataGridItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: DataGridItem 개체를 사용 하 여 프로그래밍 방식으로에 있는 항목의 속성에 액세스 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자를 사용 하 여 만들고 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
The index number of the item, from the bound data source, that appears in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 표시 되는 바인딩된 데이터 소스에서 항목의 인덱스 번호는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the data item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 항목이 나타내는 데이터를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: DataItem 속성을 사용 하 여 지정 하거나 한 나타내는 데이터 항목의 속성을 확인 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> 에서 데이터 항목을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> 바인딩된 데이터 원본에서 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSetIndex property to get the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 가져올 DataSetIndex 속성을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>바인딩된 데이터 원본에서 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the bound data source.

Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemIndex 속성을 사용 하 여의 인덱스를 결정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>에서 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A>의 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.

The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Gets the type of the item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 가 나타내는 항목의 형식을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemType 속성을 사용 하 여에 있는 항목의 형식을 결정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the various item types.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 다양 한 항목 형식을 나열합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Footer`|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Item`|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`AlternatingItem`|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`SelectedItem`|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`EditItem`|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Separator`|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Pager`|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.|
trans-unit.target: | 항목 형식 | 설명 | |---------------|-----------------| | `Header`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤의 머리글 섹션. | | `Footer`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤의 바닥글 섹션. | | `Item`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤의 항목입니다. | | `AlternatingItem`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤에 교대로 반복 되는 항목입니다. | | `SelectedItem`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤에서 선택한 항목입니다. | | `EditItem`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤에서 편집을 위해 선택한 항목입니다. | | `Separator`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>컨트롤의 항목 사이 구분 기호. | | `Pager`| 페이지 선택 섹션의는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>제어 합니다. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
The source of the event.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이벤트가 취소 되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>인터페이스.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 항목을 나타내는 개체의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>인터페이스.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the bound data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>인터페이스.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
